description: Try our easy to follow Roast Vegetable Hummus recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hummus,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Back to school,Sesame free,Budget,Summer,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Roast Vegetable Hummus Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small red capsicum, cut into 2cm pieces
1 small red onion, halved and skin removed
1 small sweet potato, cut into 2cm pieces
1 cup chickpeas, canned, rinsed and drained

recipeInstructions.text: Place carrot, capsicum, sweet potato, onion, garlic, cumin, paprika and olive oil in a medium baking dish. Stir to coat everything in oil and spices, then cook in oven for 35-40 minutes or until vegetables are soft.
Remove vegetables from oven and allow to cool. Transfer to a food processor, add chickpeas and 1/3 cup water and pulse until smooth.
Serve hummus with fresh vegetable sticks for dipping.
